description:
Annaleigh Ashford (Masters of Sex, B Positive) and Justin talk about her Broadway days, from horror stories with patrons to working with Matthew Broderick, and all of the care that went into creating her portrayal of Paula Jones on the newest installment of American Crime Story.

Impeachment: American Crime Story is available to stream on FX via Hulu with live TV.
